location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter reports news from Mirza Jaffer and the Bushire linguist that Carim Caun [Karim Khan] has promised to issue a phirmaund [firman] that will be to the Bussora [Basra] staff's satisfaction. The letter also discusses other financial matters.
